Verses.28: And one of the scribes came up. He heard them arguing and recognized that He had answered well. He asked Him, "What is the most important commandment of all?"
Verses.29: Jesus answered him, "The most important is: Hear, Israel! The Lord is our God, the Lord is one.
Verses.30: Love the Lord, your God, with all your heart, with all your soul, with all your mind, and with all your strength.
Verses.31: The second is this: Love your neighbor as yourself. There is no commandment greater than these."

Changes: 2023-10-30 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 28-30.
